reviews: Wow!  This resort is so much fun!  We went with a group of friends/co-workers for 4 nights, and absolutely fell in love with Club Med.  We stayed in a superior room in the Aguamarina section with a walk-out furnished verandah overlooking the ocean.  This was an ideal location for the water sports, tennis/pickelball courts, infinity pool (with walk-in entry), and one of the restaurants.  Shuttle service runs constantly between this area and the main beach/pool area.    We participated in several of the activities offered (snorkeling, pickleball, archery, kayaking, salsa dancing, sailing, cooking lessons, beach volleyball, bocce ball, ping pong, water volleyball, water basketball, musical performances, sunset cruise, turtle watching) and just didn't have time for all the

This was meant to be! I came to Club Med Cancún with my mom and left with life long friends and a Club Med family I hope to continue to see for years to come! This is a perfect trip for adult singles, extended families, groups of friends, and literally anyone who is interested in having a great time!!!

Thank you Cassie, Sammy, Eugenia, Yelena, Sasha, Luisa, Jorge, Pamela, Lilou and Adrian for the best vacation I could ever ask for! From the tours to the events Club Med Cancun was a blast. The crew made me feel so welcome and kept up the immaculate vibes the week I was there. THANK YOU OLIVIA FOR THE BEST BIRTHDAY EVER !!!! you made turning 31 a memory I will never forget!! Ill be sure to come back!!   -Hakeem

I loved my vacation and I will definitely be coming back! One of the best parts of my trip is the Circus Group! They were really kind and awesome! Coco, Robinho, Paulo, and Ximena were amazing and made me love Trapeze! Their performances were awesome, cool, and I loved watching them do a lot of wonderful tricks!

Chief Jose Luis has the most incredible team of GOs. For example, Chris was a fantastic exercise instructor. She was very patient and encouraging, I will miss her workouts!  Sascha, Manuel, and their amazing team at Jade made the trip extra special. They were all so attentive and put such care into their food and drinks (best ahi tuna of my life). Sascha joined our family for dinner one evening which was a treat, he is a lovely human. We appreciated Sascha’s presence as he was very kind, fun, and personable.   We all had an amazing time thanks to these great people and many more :)

My vacation at club med Cancun was amazing. Serge was the best GO. All the activities and beaches were breathtaking. The color party and pool party were very energetic.I would love to come back and do more excursions.

It was so much fun, the beaches are so pretty and clear. I did the teen club during the day and it was amazing. Serge is the best teen club med leader. He is super funny and he made club med an even better experience. I will definitely be returning to this club.

Give Serge a raise. He is the best.  The Teens Club PASSWOLRD club is very fun and it’s very easy to make friends. I would recommend coming here with family and friends it is a very amazing place and everyone should come here.

We spent one week at Club Med Cancun in June 2023, we had a great time. This was ou second stay at the Club.  The whole team made sure we enjoyed our vacations with a lot of sport activities (thank you Amine and Chrys), great food, good show and good party!  Olivia from the guest relation team answered all our questions and requests, she was super efficient and responsive.  The Club is super nice, very well located, perfect for families! We will definitely go back.

I loved this vacation it was everything it should’ve been and it had exceeded my expectations. I joined the teen club and it was a lot of fun and I made so many friends, definitely will come back. Thank you club med cancun for making my stay incredible, special thanks to SERGE for being an amazing teens club PASSWORLD leader!

My life changed after Luisa danced with me. Even though she works at reception, she went above and beyond. I will remember Luisa forever. I hope our paths cross again. Her kind heart and awesome dance moves made the trip fantastic!!!

From the moment we arrived at the resort, we had a fabulous time! We stayed for a week that started the day after a previous group had rented out the whole resort. It was very quiet when we were there, which was great! We were able to do many of the activities without waiting and we got to meet so many of the GOs on a personal level - more than usual.  We travelled as a family of three with a young adult daughter - our third time here, but the first since COVID started. We met the Chief of The Village, Jose Luis, the first day of our trip and we were able to interact with him the whole week. He was very engaging and friendly, and always had time to talk - he runs a wonderful resort  We like Club Med because of all the activities they have, and they provide lessons, which most

Had so much fun ! Cool activities to do and great staff. The G.Os were super nice, notably Sophie and Pyjama at tennis/archery, Leo, and the whole circus crew! Also went scuba diving and our dive master Pancho was a pro. Taco Arte was very tasty food, would recommend trying at least one evening (thank you Lenny for the yummy dinner). Overall great experience

Resort is fantastic for kids under 10. Teen camp was underwhelming and disappointing. Resort does nothing to protect guests from mosquitoes and they have a huge problem with them. Do a better job of protecting the guests. Food was decent. Don’t expect fine dining but it is better than most.

I had done club med vacations in the past as a single and as a parent. This time I went with my adult daughter on her invitation. We both had an amazing time. Shout out to all the GOs especially Juanito for leisure and the the chief of village. Great aqua classes, fun coffee trivia time. Delicious drinks, coffee international buffets. Amazing raw tuna! Very nice excursion. Outstanding entertainment for all ages. I can not say enough how happy I was to be invited and what an amazing time we had.

From start to finish we had a fantastic 7 day family holiday. My kids are 17(had her birthday on site), 15 & 12. The moment we arrived they catered for our every need. We were not guaranteed two rooms close together but we got adjoining rooms, absolutely perfect! The food was absolutely delicious with as much choice as anyone could need. We had dinner in the taco restaurant one night (family tasting menu) & the Argentian another night, it was outstanding. Each and every staff member was friendly and helpful. In particular Serge who ran the kids club, he was so fun.  Dani made us delicious cocktails along with all the other bar men. The guys in the pool Bar really went above and beyond, especially that they have kids ordering mocktails all day long.  The chief of the hotel was so

Beautiful location, great family vacation with teens! We love Club Med. The activities, food, activities, shows, service are all wonderful. We have been to several Clubs and this was a second trip here—we like it that much! I felt very safe.

Great good, drinks, activities and most importantly, the kids club (Petit Club) was exceptionally good for our 3 year old. I was trading texts with Fanny on her off day making sure my kid was doing well. I’d recommend this place every day of the week.

Staff were all very friendly and everything was very clean. Beds were insanely hard (and I love a firm mattress) so we didn't sleep well. Rooms were dark and smelled like mildew, despite being cleaned well daily. Food wasn't great. Activities were plentiful, but a little hard to navigate. The app is terrible - they need to make more info available, especially dining reservations. Bring mosquito spray and itch lotion! We weren't prepared for that, or the intense heat and humidity. Overall, we had fun, but I don't think it was worth the high price tag (and we had a half-off deal for booking early).

Excelllent hotel, very friendly GOs, specially Joel in tennis and Paulo in sailing. Special mention to the nurse who helped two days with a small problem and Régulo in Administration, who went out o his way to help us with plane reservations. Music before dinner was specially good and different every day. It was all worth every penny we spent! Miguel Sandoval from México City

Our family enjoyed the Club Med Cancun experience from beginning to end. While at the resort we ate and drink to our hearts content and enjoyed all the entertainment. We came back refreshed and ready to rejoin life in the fast lane.

A once in a lifetime trip with 13 family members and it could not have been better. We all stayed in Aquamarina and while for the first 1.5 days we did not have hot water, Pamela and Jose (Chief of the Village) took amazing care of us and got the problem fixed. The GO staff was superb all the way around especially, Sophie running the Archery and a ton of other activities as well as Johnny over in the snorkel shack. Daniel the bartender in the main bar was out of this world and knew my name after day one and always had some cold beers waiting on me.   The shows were fun and creative as well. The Michael Jackson show was simply awesome. It was like Michael was there. The GO shows were fun, goofy and a great way to see some great talent from some hard working people.   Jose, the

We stayed at Club Med Cancun with 13 of my family members and received amazing service.  From check-in to check-out, everyone was friendly and helpful.  They made us feel like family and we were sad to leave them.  We especially enjoyed Pamela at reception, Sophie at archery, Danielle to provide the best drinks and service and Jose (Chief of Village) was the most gracious host.  We can't wait to visit again!

Charlotte, Thank you so much for being such a passionate trainer! We enjoy every single minute of your class. Charlotte started the training with a smile and ended it up with the same smile. Thank you for sharing your energy!  Elisa, thank you for your patience with our little one. He enjoyed so much y’hid time with you @ the petit club thanks to you!  Thank you!

Huge resort, but GREAT resort. I'm an American and still felt right at home. Jose Luis was one of the best, as always, but what I really loved was the sailing. First time ever sailing was in the Sand Piper Resort in Florida... I think my instructor was Joshua? Anyways, when I went to Cancun, I got a refresher from Tony. This guy was so fun to relearn from. He said he didn't speak good English, but that was a total lie. His English was perfect. Ask for a lesson with him. The other sailor I learned from was Paulo. He was the all-time best Sailor I have ever seen in my life. I watched him on the Hobie16 that HE himself rebuilt and it was practically a spiritual experience. You won't meet a finer Sailor in your life. If you go to Cancun, go sail. That is all I have to say.

This was the most amazing resort. The staff from the front reception to the cleaners were the nicest we've ever encountered. Since the resort is at the beginning of the hotel zone, and the first one here, they have kept the mangroves around the lagoon and have lots of plants - the birds and iguana love it. It is an older resort that has been well-kept but if this is not your thing would not recommend. But if you like it more laid back and more like familia this is the place. Our room was nice overlooking the lagoon and the A/C worked very well (thankfully). The cleaners were quick and thorough each morning and if we needed anything at all it was looked after very quickly. The bed was very comfortable, the pillows were as we like them. The food was excellent - the buffet changes

I recently came back from my first solo trip and had such an amazing time which I attribute to Club Med. I’ve been to a couple different Club Med locations but this was my first time visiting Club Med Cancun. This was a short 5-day trip with my main goal of swimming with a whale shark. I did my whale shark excursion with an outside company (but they do offer that excursion at Club Med which I had not been aware of prior to arrival) but most of my time was spent at the Club Med resort. My room was very comfortable over-looking the lagoon and had all the necessary amenities. The beach was gorgeous and I was always able to find a shady spot to lounge in. La Hacienda was the main restaurant and the food was always fresh with plenty of options. I did not get a chance to try the other

I must say the people are what makes Club Med Cancun so wonderful.  The "GO team" was enthusiastic and helpful.  Almost every employee was friendly.  I learned to sail, do archery, and fly on a trapeze with excellent teachers.  I enjoyed the Mexican dancing are mariachi music. I enjoyed interacting with the employees who came from many countries. My pickups were there on time for my excursions and for arriving and departing. The people at the front desk made it happen. The restaurant people were friendly and there was a large selections of choices for all meals. Everything was kept very clean.  I felt so relaxed and cared for.

The greatest resort in Cancun. I have stayed at other places in Cancun in the recent past and keep coming back to Club med. The staff/GOs are  amazing, best I have seen for an all inclusive resort so far and really make the trip extra special! We had an especially fun experience with Paulo who took us sailing! Great experience can’t wait to go back soon!

Club Med Cancun is gorgeous, The activity are incredible. Food is delicious and many of the staff are hard working and polite people. I am a big Sailor since 1995 and I have to say NOBODY treat me the way Paulo and Antonio did. Such lovely guys who gave me private lessons just to improve my technique.  Big thank you guys and hope to see you in July when I go back.

Lots of kids and adult activities. Food exceeded our expectations, and we were really surprised at how good it was! Rooms are a bit dated, and have dangerous steps for anyone with toddlers. but staff does a great job at keeping the rooms clean. Most of the staff is really nice and friendly. Especially had a great time talking to John in the snorkeling center, Even though it was too windy to go snorkeling had a lot of great conversations with him, really great professional guy.  9-year-old daughter had a really great time in the kids club and enjoyed most of their activities. Would definitely recommend for families and had a great stay other than the steps in the room.

AguaMarina was the perfect lodging as it is close to the pool and Taco Arte restaurant- both crucial features with small grandkids! Logistics -luggage, transfers, etc- were smooth and efficient. The reservation-only dinners at Taco Arte and Estancia were both excellent. Every morning we had breakfast at Taco Arte and got to know and be cared for by Pavel, Maria, Mario "Maradona," and Humberto. We felt very "at home."  The Reception process at AguaMarina was smooth and Donna kindly saw us to our transfer vehicle as we departed which made for a helpful and considerate departure.  The evening shows were fun and worthwhile! The Trapeze activity was highly enjoyed by our adult kids who wished they had started doing it on day one! We had a health incident which was handled quickly and

This was our 2nd time at this Club Med.  I love the location, on site snorkeling and sailing, tennis, trapeze, no high rise buildings.  Most of the staff is wonderful- special thanks to management team Jose Luis, Juan Alejandro, and Pamela for all their help and recommendations.  We also loved talking with Felipe, and my kids really liked Sammy at the Mini Club.  At Taco Arte, we had wonderful service from Tobias and salads made fresh by Rudolfo. Chefs Erick and Lenny welcomed us every day and brought us fresh papaya and mango- thank you so much!  We also loved the falcon handler with a beard.  He is very friendly and we loved learning about his bird.   A few hiccups with late room cleaning/confusion, premium wifi kicking off our devices, and one unfriendly golf cart driver who

Overall great resort! Family oriented in every aspect. Kids club is a must, the staff (Lilu, Adre, and the other gentlemen in the king hat) were perfect with the kids and provided a very structured fun environment for them.  Very very minimal seaweed on the beach and the club made tremendous efforts to clean any that came ashore. The food met our expectations at the time and then exceeded them at times. The only negative I can really speak of is snorkeling. We have 3 children that could not snorkel around the reef because there were red flags out the entire time. Even on days that the water seemed calmer, the flags never changed. This was a huge disappointment for me and my children because it what we looked forward to the most. Sometimes I felt that the flag never changed

Great all-inclusive experience for families! Rooms were very comfortable with excellent air conditioning. Fun activities for all: Foam party on the beach, pool party, yoga, sailing. Our 11 and 13 year olds liked archery, trapeze and activities with the teens, especially with GOs Sammy and Serge. Easy access to beach and to scuba and snorkeling with Dive Ancila tours. Our whole family went diving/snorkeling at Dos Ojos Cenote with Paco and Jorge and had the best time exploring the under water cavern.

CONFESSION first.. I'm a Club Med fan.. there are a million and one "all inclusives" and then there is MedClub.. I have visited several Club Meds, from Egypt (sadly now closed) to St. Moritz to ski, to Punta Cana to party and Cancun to share with my girls.  When you enter any Club Med resort you feel like you are home, it's not a big tall hotel, it's the small apartments, the beatiful manicured gardens, the art in the walls inside and outside, the cleaneliness, the included entertainment, the shows, the GOs, and then the gastronomy gurus and their staff.  This time is CANCUN.. visited with my 2 girls for the weekend.  We had a wonderful time, and this review is mostly for the delighful gastronomic experience we had... Three restaurants with themes, the very special one is TACO

First time to Cancun, first Club Med, first all-inclusive. I am usually the type of person that chooses the cheaper option, but decided to splurge this year, and I'm so glad I did. It was so nice not to have to plan everything myself, but still have options.   Food: PHENOMENAL. I even used precious stomach space on salads at the buffet, because the food is that good. The main restaurant is Hacienda, done buffet style, but this is not your usual sterno-lighters under aluminum tray kind of buffet, no no. The food was on individual plates, done artistically, and was amazing food even outside of a buffet setting. We stayed for four days, and the food was different each night, and included things like skirt steak, seared scallops, beef wellington, chicken cordon bleu, ceviche, etc.

Serge is a very good G.O. He tought us very well and we had a lot of fun and a great experience in club med. Serge is the G.O.A.T. Serge is the GOAT. Serge is the greatest of all time. Serge the goat is the G.O.A.T. WE WANT EXCURSIONS IN THE TEEN CLUB PLEEEAASE!!!

This vacation is nothing without the incredible GO team that works so hard to make sure every person has the most memorable, enjoyable and fun time. I took the fitness classes every morning with Charlotte and she kicked our butts but it was my favorite part of the whole trip! She is INCREDIBLE and will be SO missed. Issam (water sports supervisor) and Uriell (trivia games host and DJ) are just a couple more GOs who made the trip truly unforgettable. Loved this vacation and everyone we met as well.

Our family of 5 (my husband & myself, 22 year old twin sons, and 19 year old daughter) had a wonderful 12 days at Club Med Cancún. We are huge Club Med fans; this was our 7th Club Med trip.  We enjoyed many activities including sailing, tennis, scuba, trapeze, bocce ball, volleyball, Zumba-like dance class, pottery painting, aqua gym, & trivia games. We also enjoyed the very impressive nightly entertainment and the nightly group line dancing parties. I personally wish there were more Reggaeton (Zumba-type) music overall for dancing in the bar after the organized group dancing (rather than techno) and that it would be played in public areas during the day (rather than American pop songs) - it creates a Caribbean party atmosphere (such as we experienced at Punta Cana). I also wish

There were a lot of good things with our stay at Club Med Cancun but a lot that was not so good. I’ll start with the bad so that we can end on a good note… The club med app is very frustrating. You can spend a lot of time looking for information that you will never find. And then you have to track someone down to get an answer to your question.  More of a waste of time than it is helpful.   We received an email message from Club Med to book spa services online now because they fill up quickly.  Booking in advance would give us a 10% discount. Scheduled three massages online only to find out on arrival that booking on site gives you a 15% discount - and that discount was offered all through the week.   There are two restaurants offering dinner on alternate nights….most of the

everything was amazing, starting from the people on the HQ that helped us to  get everything ready for the event, and all the GO´s, the Events team ath the hotel Sofia Frias she is amazing getting everything ready and with ac onstant follow up of our  group, and becoming parto f the group and famility

overall rating 10/10 Some staff that were particularly helpful are the following: Maria: waitress at Taco Arte Julio: gave initial tour of facility upon arrival Arcelina: room housekeeping staff Demitri from Haiti: staff floating around Kiosk Cynthia: nurse who assisted us during a medical emergency at restaurant one evening Many other staff whom I did not get names of. Everyone was most pleasant and helpful. Only one put off when one evening we were asked for a tip at one of the restaurants.  Since tipping is not required AND it is not necessary to carry cash around at the all inclusive resort, it felt very uncomfortable to be asked!   Also did not find the website very user friendly so had to make a few phone calls pre-trip set up reservations.  At times phone wait was

For an amazing vacation, Club Med is the only way to go! Unforgettable, amazing experience for a very reasonable price- it is all inclusive and they do an amazing job of taking care of you! Safe experience and very safe excursions when booked through Club Med. The staff is very appreciative, take great care of you, and you’ll even find a little surprise in your room on your birthday! Cancún is beautiful and unforgettable!

A great week in Cancun! Food, activites and excursions are perfect. The club is within the nature (tortle, crocodile, racoon, etc.). A huge thank to Issam of the sailing club, we recommand this activity (advice, available, the spot is Wonderful) Many thanks also to Ulysse, Sophie, Estelle, Manon, Tamara, James Bond, Iman, Charlotte & teams for the good vibes, smiles and hospitality.  Pauline & Victor

For those wondering where to go in Cancun, Club Med should be your number one choice. From the moment you walk in Mari, the front desk manager gives you the warmest greeting. She makes you feel like you are part of the family. Every day she would come to see us and check how our experience was going. As soon as you get into the buffet main room, everyone greetsdyou with a big smile and as if they know you all their lives. Carlos ,the manager would take it upon himself to check up on us to see how the food was, if there was anything we would change and if we were content with everything. Mind you, the boys that served us everyday need a special congrats also, We were with a handicap and they brought his food, and ours including the beverages , desserts and coffee. And always

The Good: We were day pass regulars at our local Club Med and so we were looking forward to using a day pass at Club Med Cancun.  If you've experienced Club Med, you know how it works.  This is an all-inclusive resort (drinks, food, and activities are included).  We ate lunch at the open-air Taco restaurant right on the water and dinner at the buffet.  Service in the restaurants was incredible.  The food had a lot of variety - it is not fine dining but it is on par with what you'd get on a cruise or Disney buffet restaurant.  The show was very fun.  It is always nice to see so many happy families with little kids.  I wish we'd known about Club Med when our kids were little.  The resort is located on a reef and there is an area for snorkeling, water sports, and lots of beach with

This was my second Club Med experience after fond memories of my first. This time, I brought my family. While we got off on the wrong foot with a series of room maintenance issues (toilet endlessly flushing, door lock issues, etc.), the staff ultimately responded by owning and resolving the reported problems.  I got the sense that most GOs really wanted us to have a good time and worked hard to make our stay care free.  I think, like many places post pandemic, there are some odds and ends to be worked out in terms of the details and quality control.  I believe that CM will get there.  The restaurants and grounds were beautiful and relaxing.  We were able to get into the resort state of mind.  The excursion and tour guides were excellent.  Not all of the food was great, but there

It was our second time and simply awesome :) Lots of things to do for the kids and adults, everyone at the resort is super-helpful, we had a lot of fun. My 10yo kid won the 2nd place in the Sailing Regata for adults, after coaching from the Clubmed sailing instructors: Issam, Paulo, and special thanks to Pablo for teaching my son how to sail! I can try to name everyone who made this stay easy and awesome and I'm sorry if I missed anyone! KidsClub: Ralph, Martha, Dimitri, Adri, Jacques, Lilou. Trapeze is THE activity kids liked and the crew was awesome: Coco, Robinho, Paulo! Special thanks to John in snorkeling! Archery range was another hit. For us best and most attentive at the restaraunt were: Alejandro, Santiago (and many others!), food was prepared by great chefs. Kids and

The nurses Ira and Cyn were outstanding and got us back on our feet so we could continue our vacation. Ira came to our room and was super kind.  The doctor on staff took her time and made sure all ok.  Even got meds quickly.

Did a last minute trip with teenage daughter.  First time at a Club Med.  Enjoyed very much.  Many activities, food was good, property overall maintained.  Couldn't quite give it a 5 due to inconsistent service and lack/absence of any instruction in some of the sports areas.  Already booked for next Club Med (Japan) stay.

The resort is wonderful! The staff are so kind, the food is beautiful. Less waste than other places and recycling is a priority.   In particular, Charlotte who ran the strength class most morning has boundless energy and enthusiasm. Her classes were great. The dive school were fantastic and my boy got his open water PADI. They looked after him.  June is a hot month to come. We’d love to come back but will choose when to come better.

I loved my stay in this club, the whole ambiance was amazing and he personnel was amazing. I participated in the teen club and it was amazing and our GO Serge and the other GO Ralph were amazing. The only thing I would add would be excursions for ten teen club, I think it would bring the whole group closer together and would be a lot of fun. The activities in the club was awesome and we had a lot of activities that we had never done before. The scenery was beautiful as well.

The food is amazing and there is something for everyone here. I had a bad experience snorkeling but everything else was amazing. Serge was the GO of the teens and was great and he allowed us to have consistently fun activities every day. Ralph was another great GO. I also loved being able to make friends with new people. I hope that the teens can get excursions. Despite that, there are tons of fun activities, even trapeze.

Club Med Cancun has been a repeat destination for our family for years. The beaches are beautiful, there is a massive variety of sports and activities on a daily basis, and the food has actually improved over the years!  Activities, entertainment, and water sports were all easily accessible and properly staffed with knowledgeable staff that was always ready to be help.  In particular, we enjoyed the restaurant staff in the main restaurant – they were particularly accommodating to our 14 month old son, who was always entertained and loved by our waiters and waitresses. We have to mention Dalia, Kevin, Mario, and Gregorio who all went the extra mile to accommodate us!!!! They were so helpful for the entire 10 days we were there that special recognition is absolutely deserved!  Our

What a week! We've been coming to Club Med Cancun for 8 years. The kids can't wait to jump into their clubs and this year, they were both officially in the "Teen Club" and each found their groups quickly - mostly speaking in French or Spanish all week which was amazing.  We added an offsite excursion to our trip this time - visiting the Mayan ruins at Tulum and exploring underground caves at the Cenotes. Well worth it!  We met daily for breakfast, enjoyed the pool and beachfront. Had fresh fish 🐟 for lunch. The 🥑 and 🥭 are the best you will ever taste!  Every afternoon, we had activities - trivia, bingo, soccer ⚽️, aquagym, workouts, snorkeling, daily beach volleyball 🏐 In the evenings, we met up for dinner and an evening show - karaoke, live bands, hip hop dancers, LED

We just returned from a 5 night trip and this was our first time in Cancun and at a Club Med. The weather was perfect and we received great service and had a memorable time. Here is a summary:  1. Kids Clubs. We have 12 and 6 year olds and both had a blast at their kids clubs. Our youngest was in the 6-10 year old group and oldest was in the 11-16 (?) age group. Before we arrived we were not sure if our kids would like it but they both had fun and were happy to go off each day. The clubs seemed to be well organized and the GO's all worked really hard to ensure the kids were looked after. 2. Beach. There was quite a bit of seaweed but Club Med had a crew out there cleaning it up each morning. It seemed that they were doing the best that they could but at the moment there is just

Club med is one of the best places to go for a family vacation. It has many activities for everyone. Kids and adults will definitely find great things to do. There’s kids clubs, circus, fitness, archery, and much more.   Thank you to Chrys and Charlotte for making me sweat and enjoy various workouts.   Thank you to Coco, Paulo and Robinho for making my trapeze skills excel during my stay.  Thank you to all the other GOs for making Club Med Cancun a memorable trip.

What a treat! It was our first time in Cancun and at Club Med and we will be back next year! It was a fantastic experience for all of us: adults and teens! The place is stunning, the rooms are clean and comfortable. The food is spectacular and the Club Med team went above and beyond to make sure our vacation was great. Special kuddos to Jean Luc: the cocktails master! Every single one of his creations were delicious! Thank you Dani and Cas as well! Charlotte the best trainer ever!! She leads the best workouts! And very special thanks to Serge and mainly Ralph for their outstanding work with the teens group!!  If you guys need a job one day please let me know!! Don’t hesitate this place is super safe and you will have the best time!

Just got back and had a great stay!  I had an issue with the room and after asking 3 staff members for help with no results I found Olivia.  She went above and beyond to make sure we were completely satisfied!!

We went with our four kids and had a marvelous time. The kids loved getting slushies whenever they wanted at the various bars. We did a lot of sailing and pickle ball. The snorkeling and food was great and our room stayed cool. We took advantage of some the resort activities. Don't miss the beach foam! My wife also enjoyed the Salsa dancing lessons. The resort employees are great. Most say "Hola" as they pass on the walkways. We also had a great conversation with Elizabeth from Jade who randomly joined us for a meal.

This is my 2nd club med experience and I love these resorts. Not having to worry about restaurant or bar tabs is awesome. I can just eat when I want and what I want and be carefree on my vacation.  The Cancun Club Med has so many wonderful activities. My family and I enjoyed the sailing and snorkeling the best. My wife loves the trapeze experience. One tip for snorkeling is when the current is strong they only let adults in. We brought facemasks for the kids so they could snorkel by the main beach but not near the reef where it was managed by the staff. My wife went every day and loved it, she also said it was strong for her. The safety concern seemed well deserved. I sailed a lot on the catamarans. The sailing staff was awesome, I wish I could remember their names. They teach

My happy place in Cancun.  G.O. s are kind and an array of activities.  Beautiful accommodations.  Best Beach location!!  Fabulous snorkeling and excellent cuisine.  Highly recommend!!!  Great for Families and Couples.

Wonderful family vacation absolutely a great place if you have a very active children! The sheer quantity of activities available is truly top-notch at Club Med! The Ocean is the perfect temperature and you could stay in at all day if you have the right sun protection! The fact that sailing snorkeling and even trapeze flying is included is really special for families. The food service was lovely and Roldolfo made the best salad with kindness at Taco Arte. Overall a great place for a family vacation my only watch out is it does not include room service which was a surprise for us. If you have young children that get overheated such as babies also might not be the time to come in July. As there is not a swim up bar with shade in the pool And most of the meals are not

Great and friendly staff, always willing to help (a special thanks to Pamela at the Aqua Marina reception, Issam for teaching us how to sail with so much fun and Charles our PADI master).  Sadly my wife and I could not relax fully as beats music was everywhere, sometime even overlapping between areas :(. A real nightmare for people like us who just wish to relax, enjoy a nice book while listening to the lapping of the waves. Food was good, diverse and fresh, and we never got sick.  Kids club was okay but our son (6 yo) didn't enjoy much the activities. Those with water scared him as GOs seem to assume kids of his age knew how to swim. Our son doesn't and no swim vest or floaties were ever proposed to him. We wish GOs could have grouped kids based on their ability to swim or not,

We had a great time, enjoyed all the activities available right on the resort and excellent snorkeling.  The resort is a bit spread out, but shuttle golf carts on a schedule helped with that, and a benefit was you could find some space to get away to a private spot on the beach.  Our oldest really liked the kid camp and Lilou even recognized him while we were from the first day he was there later on, which helped him be excited to go back!

Great all inclusive resort for families and people who love sport. The best snorkeling location in Cancun as well as a great sandy beach, no other resort has both to my knowledge. Rooms are great, food caters even to picky eaters and the child club let you enjoy some me time while on vacation. We will be back!

Club med in cancun Mexico was amazing. My husband and I and our sons ages 7&10 found something new to do every day which everyone enjoyed. From the snorkeling to sailing, swimming in the pools, and exploring the beaches, we could not have been more pleased with our vacation. I want to put a special shout out to the trapeze team, Ximena, Coco, Paulo, and Robinho! They were top notch instructors, patient and incredibly encouraging 💚 10 out of 10 I would go back just for the trapeze experience.

Had an amzing time at Club Med Cancun!! The food was terrific with a ton of variety. Taco arte had the best lunches! The aquamarina pool was refreshing, great drinks and views. The main beach was beautiful and a hidden gem was the taco arte beach in the afternoon.   Wanted to shout out to a few favorites this trip: first, thank you to Coco, Paulo, Ximena and Robinho for making my trapeze skills excel during my stay and had the best time.   And to Charlotte the best trainer ever!! She had the best workouts and so upbeat and fresh.   Also, we did the chichen itza and the cenota excurision which was fantastic. The details of the history and tour guides as informative, got there early to beat the crowds and felt very safe.
